metadata.name: Nltest.EXE Execution
metadata.comment: Detects nltest commands that can be used for information discovery

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\nltest.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('nltestrk.exe'))

output.summary: Detects nltest commands that can be used for information discovery

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activity Reference: https://jpcertcc.github.io/ToolAnalysisResultSheet/details/nltest.htm
